price: ئاخۆ چۆن بێ (حاڵی ئەو ناپاکانە) کاتێك فریشتەکان گیانیان دەکێشن و لە ڕوخسار وپاشیان دەدەن
arabic: فَكَيۡفَ إِذَا تَوَفَّتۡهُمُ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ يَضۡرِبُونَ وُجُوهَهُمۡ وَأَدۡبَٰرَهُمۡ

version.title: Kurdish Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kurdish by Muhammad Saleh Bamuky. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fakayfa idhā tawaffathumu al-malāikatu yaḍribūna wujūhahum wa-adbārahum
